sentences.sContent: A small token payment will keep the bank happy.
sentences.sCn: 象征性地付点钱，银行就会满意了。

synos.tran: 象征的；表意的；作为对某事的保证的

phrases.pCn: 令牌环（一个环状的区域网路）
令牌传递，令牌传送；通行令牌

trans.tranOther: someone who is included in a group to make everyone think that the group has all types of people in it, when this is not really true

trans.tranCn: 专用辅币，代金券；信物，标志
trans.tranOther: a round piece of metal that you use instead of money in some machines
